table-entry.name: Processflow
table-entry.col-data: id integer not null generated by default as identity (start with 1, increment by 1), name varchar(100) not null, creation timestamp not null, lastopened timestamp, clamping_manner integer default 1 not null, single_cycle boolean default false not null, constraint pkey_processflow primary key (id)

table-entry.name: step
table-entry.col-data: id integer not null generated by default as identity (start with 1, increment by 1), processflow integer not null, type integer not null, index integer not null, constraint pkey_step primary key (id), constraint step_processflow foreign key (processflow) references ADMIN.processflow(id) on delete cascade
